> Spry Servers is a Phoenix, AZ, USA based service provider. With more than 5 years in business, and now two US data center locations (Dallas & Phoenix); we are a fast growing provider of pure SSD shared and reseller hosting, Nextcloud hosting, top-of-the-line dedicated servers, VPS and more. Our services are backed by a 99.9% uptime SLA. We offer a 30 day money back guarantee for most products.

**_Clearance dedicated server - No coupon needed_**

_Limited qty available. While supplies last._

**CPU:** Intel Xeon E3-1220 (4C/4T, 8MB L3 Cache)
**Memory:** 8 GB DDR3
**IPv4:** /30 (1 usable)
**IPv6:** /64 (/48 free upon request)
**Uplink:** 100 Mbps (upgrade-able to 1 Gbps)
**Traffic:** 20 TB
**Location:** Phoenix, AZ, USA - Aligned Energy DC
**Price:** $49/mo - **[Order Now](https://clik.rip/8Iern)**

IPMI/iLO access allowed. Free OS reloads. Private networking free upon request.

**Phoenix Test IPs:**
- IPv4: 23.130.97.33
- IPv6: 2602:fe6b:1010:1000::1
